t: 8:4*r Septuagint (see also Dead Sea Scrolls and 1 Chron. 18:4); Masoretic Text captured*i seventeen*i hundred*i of*i his*i charioteers*i
8:8*r See some Septuagint manuscripts (see also 1 Chron. 18:8); Hebrew Betah.*i
8:9*r Hebrew Toi*i , a variant of Tou*i ; also in verse 10
8:12*r Some Hebrew manuscripts, Septuagint and Syriac (see also 1 Chron. 18:11); most Hebrew manuscripts Aram*i
8:13*r A few Hebrew manuscripts, Septuagint and Syriac (see also 1 Chron. 18:12); most Hebrew manuscripts Aram*i (that is, Arameans)
8:18*r Or were*i chief*i officials*i (see Septuagint and Targum; see also 1 Chron. 18:17)
